title: League client crashing
body: Sick to god of this fucking game. I can't even play it at this point. Done everything in my power to stop issue. I go into games and the game just freezes cant stop through task manager have to unplug and re-plug my pc only happens with league can someone help me. The amount of leaver busters and lost ranked games in enough to piss anyone off. If anyone knows anyway to fix it i would be happy to listen had this issue for months now. Spent upwards of 100 hours trying to fix this reinstalled multiple times...

replies.body: Submit a ticket to player support detailing your issue and include a concise list of what you've tried already: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
